support.title: A bunny kiss (and cotton tail dance)
support.descp: It is not about the quantity, but about participation. Thank you for being part of The Biglo Book project. A super fluffy kiss and endless gratitude are already flying to reach you.

support.title: A special postcard from The Biglo Post
support.descp:
Do you still remember the excitement of receiving a postcard from a friend? Our little bunny community will write to you, or to someone you want to surprise, a very special postcard with a collectible, The Biglo Book stamp!
INCLUDES:
1 The Biglo Book handwritten postcard with collectible stamp

support.title: The Biglo Book write your story
support.descp:
This is the real challenge. How many of you are willing to spend the best time of your lives with your kids inventing and writing a story, imagining what was actually happening in the pictures?
I did it once with my dad and it is one of the best memories I have from my childhood. Just saying...
With this pledge you will get a great softcover picture book with blank pages to write your story and, of course, the possibility to write your own title on the cover.
You will also get an electrostatic sticker of Lu for your window (no glue!).
This one is just to cool to be real.
INCLUDES:
The Biglo Book write-yourself softcover copy
Lu window stickers

support.title: The Biglo Book hardcover copy
support.descp:
Well, now the real journey begins.
An amazing hardcover copy of the first book of the series ‘Lu and the jar of happiness’ will come to your home to tell the whole family a story about happiness, kindness and why not, show an enchanted miniature world that really exists somewhere.
With this pledge you will receive the book in one language of your choice among:
- English
- Italian
- Slovenian
- French
Also, you will receive a great The Biglo Book poster to play Seek & Find with your little ones and a set of electrostatic stickers (no glue) for your windows to play with our funny bunnies!
Isn't it an incredible set of rewards?
INCLUDES:
The Biglo Book Seek & Find poster
The Biglo Book hardcover copy (EN, IT, FR, SI)
Lu window stickers

support.title: The Biglo Book bilingual hardcover copy
support.descp:
This series of books is meant to surprise your kids again and again with its fabulous illustrations, the narrative of the story and, in this case, the discovery of the same world described with words from another language.
Your reward for this pledge is a special place in my heart. And, of course, a marvelous hardcover copy of The Biglo Book in two languages to choose from:
- English / Italian
- English / Slovenian
- English / French
- Italian / French
Also, you will receive a great The Biglo Book poster to play Seek & Find with your little ones and a set of electrostatic stickers (no glue) for your windows to play with our funny bunnies!
If we hit our stretch goals, we will add new languages on that list!
Hvala za podporo! (Thank you for your support. That was in Slovenian.)
INCLUDES:
Bilingual The Biglo Book hardcover copy
The Biglo Book Seek & Find poster
Lu window stickers

support.title: Early Bird Bunny Bundle
support.descp:
First backers have a very special place in the heart and in the memory of every Kickstarter campaign's creator. That's why they deserve a very special reward.
With this Early Bird Bunny Bundle, you will get home a 'taste of everything' and much more gratitude that you will be able to handle:
- 1 The Biglo Book write-yourself softcover copy
- 1 The Biglo Book hardcover copy to choose among different languages:
English
Italian
French
Slovenian
- 1 The Biglo Book bilingual hardcover copy to choose among:
English / French
English / Italian
English / Slovenian
Slovenian / Italian
Italian / French
- 1 Seek & Find poster
- 1 set of electrostatic stickers for the windows (no glue needed!)
Isn't it a good reason enough to back my project?
INCLUDES:
The Biglo Book hardcover copy (EN, IT, FR, SI)
The Biglo Book write-yourself softcover copy
The Biglo Book Seek & Find poster
Bilingual The Biglo Book hardcover copy
Lu window stickers

support.title: The Biglo Book 'we are a big family' set
support.descp:
Ok so you have more than one kid or grandchildren and you don't want to see fights for the book?
I can totally understand that.
Do you think that these books could be perfect Christmas gifts?
I could not agree more.
This pledge will help you out with a great reward:
- 1 The Biglo Book in a language of your choice (EN, IT, FR, SI)
- 1 The Biglo Book in two languages to choose from:
English / French
English / Italian
English / Slovenian
Slovenian / Italian
Italian / French
- 1 The Biglo Book write-yourself
Also, you will receive 3 great The Biglo Book posters to play Seek & Find, a set of electrostatic stickers (no glue) for your windows to play with our funny bunnies and cute bunny postcards to keep in touch with your friends the old way!
Quite a great bundle, isn't it?
INCLUDES:
The Biglo Book hardcover copy (EN, IT, FR, SI)
Bilingual The Biglo Book hardcover copy
The Biglo Book write-yourself softcover copy
3× A set of The Biglo Book postcards
3× The Biglo Book Seek & Find poster
Lu window stickers

support.title: The Biglo Book 'we are a tribe' set
support.descp:
So you are a little tribe, uh? No problem, this reward will solve everything:
- 2 The Biglo Book in a language of your choice
- 2 The Biglo Book in two languages to choose from:
English / French
English / Italian
English / Slovenian
Slovenian / Italian
Italian / French
- 2 The Biglo Book write yourself
Also, you will receive 6 great The Biglo Book posters to play Seek & Find with your little ones, a set of electrostatic stickers (no glue) for your windows to play with our funny bunnies and cute bunny postcards to keep in touch with your friends the old way!
I can already see all of you playing...
INCLUDES:
2× The Biglo Book hardcover copy (EN, IT, FR, SI)
2× Bilingual The Biglo Book hardcover copy
2× The Biglo Book write-yourself softcover copy
6× A set of The Biglo Book postcards
6× The Biglo Book Seek & Find poster
Lu window stickers

support.title: The silver bunny set
support.descp:
If you are reading this one, you already have a very special place in my hearth.
The silver bunny set is for those who like the idea of The Biglo Book, but also appreciate the art that is behind that project.
With this pledge you will receive an OOAK artistic bunny made just for you, with the personality and the name you decide.
And, of course, 3 books of your choice among:
- The Biglo Book in the language of your choice
- The Biglo Book in two languages to choose from:
English / French
English / Italian
English / Slovenian
Slovenian / Italian
Italian / French
- The Biglo Book write yourself
Also, you will receive 3 great The Biglo Book posters to play Seek & Find, a set of electrostatic stickers (no glue) for your windows to play with our funny bunnies and cute bunny postcards to keep in touch with your friends the old way!
And a very special little surprise that...shhhh...I told you it was a surprise!
INCLUDES:
3× The Biglo Book copies of your choice
3× The Biglo Book Seek & Find poster
OOAK bunny with your personality
1 unexpected surprise
Lu window stickers

support.title: The golden bunny set
support.descp:
If you are reading this one also...there are some 350 'thank you' waiting to be sent to you.
The golden bunny set is something very special. You will name and choose the personality of one character of the book and you will receive it at home numbered with a certificate of authenticity.
And yes, you will receive also 6 books of your choice among:
- The Biglo Book in the language of your choice
- The Biglo Book in two languages to choose from:
English / French
English / Italian
English / Slovenian
Slovenian / Italian
Italian / French
- The Biglo Book write yourself
Also, you will receive 6 posters to play Seek & Hide, a set of electrostatic stickers (no glue) for your windows to play with our funny bunnies and cute bunny postcards to keep in touch with your friends the old way!
... and very special surprise made just for you.
INCLUDES:
6× The Biglo Book copies of your choice
3× The Biglo Book Seek & Find poster
OOAK bunny with your personality
Your character in the story
1 unexpected surprise
Lu window stickers

support.title: Good Samaritan
support.descp:

Large Bookmark with Illustration of Christ (3.67" x 8.5")

support.title: Project Benefactor
support.descp:
We cannot thank you enough for doing this. This all but ensures that we can move forward with the project. As a thank you, we will send you 10 copies of the book + 10 of all the other rewards for you to give as gifts to whomever you'd like + we will add you to a special dedication page of the book (optional). Thank you!

support.title: Digital Artbooks
support.descp: Get digital copies of both art books delivered to your email inbox.

support.title: 1 Hardcover Book
support.descp:
60 Page hardcover artbook that includes sketches, pinups and artwork. Signed with a thank you. Choose between book 1 or 2. Free shipping to anywhere in the USA
INCLUDES:
Volume 1 OR 2 Hardcover

support.title: Artbook 1 & 2 Hardcover
support.descp:

(Save $5)
INCLUDES:
Volume 1 Hardcover
Volume 2 Hardcover

support.title: Traveler Comic Page + Both Books
support.descp:
Get a rare one-of-a-kind comic page from Stan Lee's "The Traveler" Series. These pages are traditionally drawn on 11x17 inch bristol board with digitally printed guides. This reward level will include one random Traveler page, both hardcover books signed, and the exclusive metal print.
INCLUDES:
Original Traveler Page
Volume 1 Hardcover
Volume 2 Hardcover
Metal Print

INCLUDES:
Volume 1 Hardcover
Volume 2 Hardcover
Bust Commission

support.title: Temerity Cameo
support.descp:
You or your original character will appear in the first issue of Chad Hardin's next project: Temerity. Will you be a mech mecenary? A genetically enhanced super-soldier? Or dead? You'll have to wait and see!
Comes with both Books, Metal Print, and a commission of your character.
INCLUDES:
Super Cool CAMEO!
Bust Commission
Metal Print
